muthalif thawamath gedara aawe natha.luanu koratuwata wathura damannata kiya ohu giye handawath aragena wuwath, ohu thawath tikak pa්ramada wanne nam yehekayi ramsiyata sithenne dahawal kala piru ramasan upawasaya athharinnata aya thawamath roti puchcha nathi heyini.punchi puthun thun denada watakaragena ekama athiliyaka damagath lunumiris thawaramin roti kaddi me sitinne motar saha wedi handa ekata kalathunu, yuda biyen piditha wu parisarayaka nowedayi athiwana biyath wichikichchawath kohedo aathakata palayayi.

eya bodu sith ada – bandaganna suluya.eheth, hindagala aithihasika rajamaha wiharasthanaye buddha puthrayin wahansege da awawada anushasana athiwa peradeniya – galaha margaye hindagala mansandhiyehi pradeshawasin wisin wishala wiyadamak daramin idikala budu madura wiwrutha kara ema sthanayen ude – hawa seth pirith handa pathurawa harimata sathiyak gatha nowuni.pirith asannata bari bhuthayeku aawesha wi polisiye da sahaya athiwa, pradeshayatama shanthiyak wu hindagala mansandhiyen asunu seth pirith handa nathara kara atha.pradeshayata aashirwadayak ma wu seth pirith handa nathara kirima pradeshawasinge kanassallata hethuwi thibe.meya malwathu maha nahimiyangeth wisheshayen hindagala rajamaha wiharadhikari himiyangeth awadhanaya yomuwiya yuthu karunak bawa hindagala man sandhiye janathawa kiyathi..
ko agata ‘ti‘ yanna.

thama gam piyase sewaya[sanskaranaya] sahaya misam piyathumaku lesa yam dewasthanayaka sewaya kirimata aashawen pasu wuwada, ewani kisiwak nolabima nisa adhairyata path nowu tharuna juse was piyathuma kale thama sathuwa thibu kalayen prayojana ganimin thama handi waduna gama wu sankolaye, pujakawaraya labimata sudanamwa siti tharunayanta lathin bhashawa iganwimayi thamagema sohoyuriyage puthraya wu joshap karawallo juse was piyathumangen lathin bhashawa igenagath mulma shishyaya wiya.
